verses.name: Job 38:34
verses.text: Canst thou lift up thy voice to the clouds, that abundance of waters may cover thee?

verses.name: Job 38:35
verses.text: Canst thou send lightnings, that they may go, and say unto thee, Here we are?

verses.name: Job 38:36
verses.text: Who hath put wisdom in the inward parts? or who hath given understanding to the heart?

verses.name: Job 38:37
verses.text: Who can number the clouds in wisdom? or who can stay the bottles of heaven,

verses.name: Job 38:38
verses.text: When the dust groweth into hardness, and the clods cleave fast together?

verses.name: Job 38:39
verses.text: Wilt thou hunt the prey for the lion? or fill the appetite of the young lions,
